title: As per news,Google Pixel 2 & Pixel 2XL being discontinued within 2 years of launch .
content:
Google Pixel 2 battery and overall phone performance is not good considering Google brand . Even getting support is quite cumbersome.
Now Pixel 2 & Pixel 2XL are being discontinued which will further impact  Google brand's creditability in premium phone segment as buyers feel cheated and would prefer iPhone, OnePlus and Samsung brands on account of better quality of product and customer support.
